subtasks.name: Review Regulation Requirements
subtasks.description: Understand the specific requirements of the RAISE Act and how they apply to manufacturing operations.
subtasks.notes: External legal consultation may be needed.

subtasks.name: Develop Compliance Plan
subtasks.description: Create a comprehensive plan detailing how the plant will meet the RAISE Act requirements.
subtasks.notes: Collaboration with legal and technical teams is essential.

subtasks.name: Implement Training Programs
subtasks.description: Establish training programs for employees on AI safety and compliance with the RAISE Act.
subtasks.notes: Training effectiveness should be regularly evaluated.

subtasks.name: Monitor Compliance
subtasks.description: Set up a monitoring system to ensure ongoing compliance with the RAISE Act.
subtasks.notes: Regular audits may be required.

subtasks.name: Documentation and Reporting
subtasks.description: Maintain records of compliance activities and prepare necessary reports as required by the regulation.
subtasks.notes: Documentation should be thorough to avoid penalties.

key_risks: Lack of understanding of AI safety requirements may lead to non-compliance.
Insufficient training may result in employee errors in AI usage.

subtasks.name: Review Regulation Requirements
subtasks.description: Analyze the RAISE act to understand compliance requirements.
subtasks.notes: External legal consultation may be needed.

subtasks.name: Develop Training Program for AI Use
subtasks.description: Create a training program for employees on responsible AI usage.
subtasks.notes: Consider involving AI specialists for content.

subtasks.name: Implement Transparency Measures
subtasks.description: Establish protocols for transparency in AI model usage.
subtasks.notes: May require technical audits and assessments.

subtasks.name: Create Employee Rights and Protections Policy
subtasks.description: Draft policies outlining employee rights regarding AI use.
subtasks.notes: Legal review will be essential.

subtasks.name: Establish Reporting and Compliance Mechanisms
subtasks.description: Set up processes for reporting violations and ensuring compliance.
subtasks.notes: Regular audits may be necessary for compliance.

key_risks: Non-compliance with new regulations could result in penalties.
Insufficient training may lead to misuse of AI technologies.

subtasks.name: Review Regulation Text
subtasks.description: Thoroughly read and understand the RAISE Act and its implications for the manufacturing processes.
subtasks.notes: Essential for understanding compliance requirements.

subtasks.name: Identify AI Systems in Use
subtasks.description: Catalog all artificial intelligence systems currently utilized in manufacturing operations.
subtasks.notes: Critical for establishing compliance scope.

subtasks.name: Assess Compliance Gaps
subtasks.description: Evaluate current AI systems against the RAISE Act requirements to identify compliance gaps.
subtasks.notes: May require external consultation for legal interpretation.

subtasks.name: Develop Training Program
subtasks.description: Create a training program for employees on the responsible use of AI as per the regulation.
subtasks.notes: Training must be tailored to specific AI applications in use.

subtasks.name: Implement Compliance Measures
subtasks.description: Put in place necessary changes to operations and policies to ensure compliance with the RAISE Act.
subtasks.notes: Implementation may require technical adjustments and policy updates.

key_risks: Potential misinterpretation of legal requirements leading to non-compliance.
Insufficient training leading to improper use of AI technologies.
